ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.AModel<AView>
      • ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.User

  • public class User
extends AModel<AView>
    Holds all the data that the individual user whom is using the application creates/modifies. This includes top-level comments and replies and makes the view availible when the user goes to "My Comments" from the start screen.
